title: Giant thumbnails in landscape mode
content: I have no idea who at Google thought this was a good idea or if this is a bug but when thumbnails are this big in landscape mode you have to ask has weed been made mandatory for Google employees or did Mr and Mrs Google let the kids loose but honestly is there a fix I don't like this at all check these screenshots the first one is the whole screen each thumbnail is one and half times the screen size come on Google put the weed down what's the fix for this I've been stuck with this the last couple of days I hate it fix now
